com.solvvy.nlp

Class NlpHub

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.solvvy.nlp.NlpHub
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable

    public class NlpHub
extends Object
implements AutoCloseable
    NlpHub acts as the central hub for all things NLP. Because there are a lot of common nlp classes that are frequently used together, this class acts as a convenience to accessing all of those classes while helping to ensure they are only constructed once, as typically is only needed.

    Functionality accessible via NlpHub include:

    • Word processing
    • Text processing
    • Keyword parsing
    • A lexicon of stopwords
    • A store of idf values for words

    NlpHub implements AutoCloseable because it acquires resources from disk that need to be released when finished.
